headline: Ask HN: Has the quality of TheVerge.com gone down significantly?
description:
I know that they never were excellent, but I remember them being quite good on day to day mainstream tech events. But now, whenever I open it, it feels like reading BuzzFeed or some other dumpster fire.

To give an example which was published just today: https://www.theverge.com/2022/4/5/23011810/elon-musk-twitter-sec-board-member-moderation

It starts with: "Ahahahahahaha fine. Longtime shitposter Elon Musk, who has a side gig as the CEO of Tesla, is on the board of Twitter, a newly minted meme stonk, after filing the wrong form with the Securities and Exchange Commission. Tremendous content."

So, question: does anybody else feel that way or was it always shit and I just didn't notice or am I just growing old?

Lastly, any recommendations on good mainstream day to day tech sites/blogs (as I won't be reading this trash anymore)?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: TheVerge.com的质量是否明显下降了？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: TheVerge.com的質量是否明顯下降了？
description_zh-Hans:
我知道他们从来不是优秀的，但我记得他们在日常的主流科技活动中是相当不错的。但现在，每当我打开它，感觉就像在读BuzzFeed或其他一些垃圾场。

举一个今天刚发表的例子：https://www.theverge.com/2022/4/5/23011810/elon-musk-twitter-sec-board-member-moderation

它的开头是："Ahahahaha fine. 在向美国证券交易委员会提交了错误的表格后，长期担任特斯拉首席执行官的埃隆-马斯克进入了推特公司的董事会，推特公司是一个新诞生的回忆性石器。巨大的内容。"

所以，问题是：还有人有这种感觉吗，还是它一直是狗屎，而我只是没有注意到，或者我只是在变老？

最后，有什么好的主流日常科技网站/博客的推荐吗（因为我不会再读这些垃圾）？
